description: Create a comprehensive business report generator app with a dark professional theme. Include a header with app title 'Enigma Business Report Generator'. Build a multi-step form that collects: business name, industry, website URL (optional), target location, and business description. Add a prominent 'Generate Report' button.

Implement report generation that analyzes the business and displays: Business Overview section, Strengths & Weaknesses Analysis (list format with icons), Revenue Generation Opportunities (focused on website creation and SEO optimization with actionable steps), Competitor Analysis (find and list 3-5 competitors with brief descriptions), Market Trends (relevant industry trends), SEO Keywords & Search Trends (popular search terms related to the business with search volume indicators), and Action Plan (clear numbered steps). Use professional cards, icons, and visual hierarchy.

Add PDF export functionality using browser print API. Include an 'Export to PDF' button that opens the print dialog with proper styling for PDF output. Ensure the report looks professional when exported with good page breaks and formatting.

Integrate real competitor research and market trend analysis. Use fetch API to search for competitors in the industry and gather market intelligence. Display realistic data including competitor websites, their strengths, current market trends with percentages, and SEO keywords with estimated search volumes. Add loading states during report generation.

Polish the UI with smooth animations, responsive design for mobile/tablet, professional color scheme (dark blues, purples, whites), modern glassmorphism effects, and clear visual hierarchy. Add icons throughout the report sections. Include a footer with app information.

Completely remove the multi-step form. Replace with a single, simple landing page that has: app title, a single text input field for business name, and a Generate Report button. Make it clean and minimal with the dark theme.

Simplify the report generation logic. When user enters just a business name and clicks Generate, automatically generate a complete professional report with all sections (business overview, strengths, weaknesses, revenue opportunities, competitors, market trends, SEO keywords, action plan) without requiring any other input. Use the business name to infer industry and generate realistic data.
Keep the PDF export button visible when report is shown. Ensure it works properly with the simplified single-page layout.
Fix any TypeScript errors or runtime issues. Make sure the app loads and works immediately without any configuration or complex steps.
